rangedBars.name: Ammo
rangedBars.description: Weapon's Ammo Capacity.

rangedBars.name: Blast Damage
rangedBars.description: Measure of the explosion Damage.

rangedBars.name: Blast Radius
rangedBars.description: Measure of the explosion Radius.

rangedBars.name: Burn
rangedBars.description: Strength of the Weapons's Damage over Time (DoT) effects

rangedBars.name: Charge Rate
rangedBars.description: How fast the Charge Attack charges.

rangedBars.name: Cloud Radius
rangedBars.description: The Range and Size of the Flame. Affects how many enemies are Hit and Suppressed.

rangedBars.name: Collateral
rangedBars.description: Increases the Weapon's Stagger, Impact and Suppression.

rangedBars.name: Critical Bonus
rangedBars.description: Chance of landing a Critical Hit and how much Damage it will do.
modifiers: Primary Action Critical Damage vs Unarmoured: %
Primary Action Critical Damage vs Flak Armoured: %
Primary Action Critical Damage vs Maniac: %
Primary Action Critical Damage vs Carapace Armoured: %
Primary Action Critical Damage vs Infested: %
Secondary Action Critical Damage vs Unarmoured: %
Secondary Action Critical Damage vs Unyielding: %
Secondary Action Critical Damage vs Maniac: %
Secondary Action Critical Damage vs Infested: %

rangedBars.name: Damage
rangedBars.description: How much Damage the weapon inflicts.
modifiers: Secondary Action Damage vs First Target

rangedBars.name: Melee Damage
rangedBars.description: How much Damage the weapon inflicts in Melee.

rangedBars.name: Mobility
rangedBars.description: Measure of the Movement Speed, Sprint Speed, and Dodge distance bonus while the weapon is active.

rangedBars.name: Penetration
rangedBars.description: Weapon's effectiveness against Armoured enemies.

rangedBars.name: Penetration (Blast)
rangedBars.description: Explosion's effectiveness against Armoured enemies

rangedBars.name: Quell Speed
rangedBars.description: Bonus to Quelling the wielder's Peril or Venting the Weapon's Overcharge (as appropriate).

rangedBars.name: Range
rangedBars.description: Effective Range of the weapon before Damage fall-off kicks in.

rangedBars.name: Reload Speed
rangedBars.description: Measure of the time it takes to reload.

rangedBars.name: Stability
rangedBars.description: Affects Recoil, Spread and Sway after firing the weapon.

rangedBars.name: Stopping Power
rangedBars.description: Measure of the Impact and Stagger inflicted on enemies.

rangedBars.name: Thermal Resistance
rangedBars.description: Use of this weapon generates Heat. The higher the Thermal Resistance value, the less Heat is generated with each attack.

rangedBars.name: Warp Resistance
rangedBars.description: Use of this weapon increases a Psyker's Peril. The higher the Warp Resistance, the less Peril is generated with each attack.
